item.description:
After serving as a bridesmaid 27 times, a young woman (Katherine Heigl) wrestles with the idea of standing by her sister's side as her sibling marries the man she's secretly in love with.


"...a pleasantly predictable romantic comedy that sees Katherine Heigl following Knocked Up with smooth moves at the wheel..."
Variety
- Joe Leydon


For more information, check out the 27 Dresses website.

After the movie we can grab a bite or a drink somewhere. There are a lot of places around. If anyone has a preference, just list it in your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll meet you just inside the lobby.
item.name: 27 Dresses
